Database Export

utility.neo4j_export.neo4j_export(tttx, export_path='export/', option='detailed')[source]

Export dataframes from TaintedTX object to csv file for neo4j import.

Parameters

  • tttx – TaintedTX object.

  • export_path – String of folder path for the exported files.

  • option – String of the option name that dictates how the neo4j exported data structure.

‘detailed’ includes block/tx/output/input/adr as their own nodes. ‘simple’ includes only adr and tx as node and put output/input as relationship detail. ‘outputonly’ includes only output as node.

Returns

csv files containing header for nodes and relationships.
